Detailed Description

Provides specific methods for Variable table entries

Definition at line 36 of file Variable.php.

Member Function Documentation

Variable::__construct (  BDDRecord $  newRec  ) 
 

Initialises Variable from the BDDRecord $newRec. If $newRec is NULL, Variable is empty. Sets IsValid to false.

Parameters:
$newRec a BDDRecord to copy/cast or NULL

Definition at line 158 of file Variable.php.

Variable::Validate (  $  siteTable  ) 
 

Tries to validate the Variable in order to save it into DataBase.

Parameters:
$siteTable a BDDTableSite object (where BDD should be replaced by your current Database : eg. MySQLTableSite). A valid BDDTableSite implements TableSiteInterface
Returns:
- NULL if object has been validated

- an Errors object in case of error(s) :

VariableError::VARIABLE_NAME_EMPTY if property TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME is empty

BDDError::TABLE_CLASS_INCORRECT if $groupTable is not a valid instance

VariableError::VARIABLE_SCOPE_INCORRECT if property TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE is incorrect

VariableError::VARIABLE_ACCESS_INCORRECT if property TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS is incorrect

VariableError::VARIABLE_IDSITE_INEXISTANT if property TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE refers to a non existant site
